attributes.action: immediately scrap the BBC Licence Tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxpayers money is being handed out as bonuses while taxpayers are having to decide whether to eat or heat.  This is immoral and the only way to stop it is to scrap the BBC Licence Tax

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
